scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/mainnet-twab-rewards subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:polygon: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/polygon-twab-rewards subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.deploy:avalanche: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/avalanche-twab-rewards subgraph.avalanche.yaml
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/rinkeby-twab-rewards subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy:mumbai: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/mumbai-twab-rewards subgraph.mumbai.yaml
scripts.deploy:fuji: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/fuji-twab-rewards subgraph.fuji.yaml
scripts.all-mainnet: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet
scripts.all-polygon: yarn clean && yarn prepare:polygon && yarn gen:polygon && yarn deploy:polygon
scripts.all-avalanche: yarn clean && yarn prepare:avalanche && yarn gen:avalanche && yarn deploy:avalanche
scripts.all-rinkeby: yarn clean && yarn prepare:rinkeby && yarn gen:rinkeby && yarn deploy:rinkeby
scripts.all-mumbai: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mumbai && yarn gen:mumbai && yarn deploy:mumbai
scripts.all-fuji: yarn clean && yarn prepare:fuji && yarn gen:fuji && yarn deploy:fuji
scripts.test: yarn clean && yarn prepare:polygon && yarn gen:polygon && cp subgraph.polygon.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph test
